name: No Shit Sherlock
description:
NO SHIT SHERLOCK! topdown puzzle adventure

Sherlock has been drinking laxatives... again...

Steer the sensitive Sherlock through different rooms and collect Question Marks to solve cases. But remember, don't touch walls or objects or things will get *fart* messy.

Controls:

Use LEFT and RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to steer Sherlock.

Team Members:

Alin Baltatescu, Tue Dommergaard, Henrik Nørgaard, Céline Guidot, Christoffer Jensen, Jesper Knudsen
